revision.comment: v2.02 - Repaired 2 links to disambiguation pages - [[WP:DPL|(You can help)]] - [[Acoustic]], [[Audible]] both per [[WP:DDAB]]
revision.text:
{{wiktionary|audio}} '''Audio''' most commonly refers to [[sound]], as it is transmitted in signal form. It may also refer to:
{{TOC right}} ==Sound== *[[Audio signal]], an electrical representation of sound *[[Audio frequency]], a frequency in the audio spectrum *[[Digital audio]], representation of sound in a form processed and/or stored by computers or other digital electronics *Audio, audible [[content (media)|content]] in audio production and publishing *[[Semantic audio]], extraction of symbols or meaning from audio *[[Stereophonic audio]], method of sound reproduction that creates an illusion of multi-directional audible perspective
==Entertainment== *[[AUDIO (group)]], an American R&B band of 5 brothers formerly known as TNT Boyz and as B5 *[[Audio (album)|''Audio'' (album)]], an album by the Blue Man Group *[[Audio (magazine)|''Audio'' (magazine)]], a magazine published from 1947 to 2000 *[[Audio (musician)]], UK drum and bass artist *[[Audio (song)|"Audio" (song)]], a song by LSD ==Computing== *{{tag|audio|content=}}, an HTML element, see [[HTML5 audio]]
==See also== *[[Acoustic (disambiguation)]] *[[Audible (disambiguation)]] *[[Radio broadcasting]] *[[Sound recording and reproduction]] *[[Sound reinforcement]]
{{disambiguation}}
